LanguageData.FGL_EarlyContentLoading_Label: Load mod content early during idle periods. The game may become unresponsive while loading; disable this if you encounter issues.
LanguageData.FGL_DelayGraphicLoading_Label: Delay loading graphics and icons at startup and stream them in during play. This shortens load time but may be unstable; disable if problems occur.
LanguageData.FGL_DisableStaticAtlasesBaking_Label: Disable static atlas baking. Speeds up loading but may make map rendering slightly slower.
LanguageData.FGL_TextureDownscale_Description: Some mods contain many high-res textures that take a long time to load. Use this to downscale them. Additionally, DDS files generated by RimPy will be deleted so you can recompress with this tool again. The following textures will be reduced to target size: Building - 256px Pawn - 256px Apparel - 128px Weapon - 128px Item - 128px Plant - 128px Tree - 256px Terrain - 1024px
LanguageData.FGL_TextureDownscale_Confirm: Perform texture downscaling? You can revert by re-downloading the mods.
